description: Erection of a single storey infill extension to the front elevation along Northolme Road.
site_name: St Joan Of Arc Primary School
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: A landscaping scheme shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority prior to the occupation of the new infill extension.  The detailed landscaping scheme should include the following details:

1)	Four replacement trees, planted in the open space along the frontage adjacent to the development.  The replacement tree species shall be Liquidamber and/ or Turkish Hazel.
2)	A mixed native hedge also planted in the open space along the frontage adjacent to the development.  The mixed native hedge species shall include Wayfaring tree, Service tree, Hawthorn and Gueilder rose.

All landscaping in accordance with the approved scheme shall be completed during the first planting season following practical completion of the development hereby approved.  The landscaping and tree planting must have a two year maintenance / watering provision following planting and any trees or shrubs which die within five years of completion of the development shall be replaced to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority with the same species or an approved alternative. 

REASON:  To secure the appropriate provision of trees and to ensure that the life of the trees would not unduly constrained in accordance with policies 3D.15; 4A.3 of the London Plan 2008 and policies: Env6; Env7; Env10; D6 and T47 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
